description: 58-year-old female with metastatic NSCLC (adenocarcinoma), KRAS G12C positive. Treated brain metastases with stereotactic radiosurgery (SRS) 6 months ago - currently radiographically stable and off steroids x3 months. Failed first-line docetaxel/ramucirumab (PD-L1 negative). Now with progressive lung and adrenal lesions. Performance status has declined slightly over past month. Cardiac history: well-controlled hypertension on lisinopril. Never smoker. Labs: mild anemia (Hgb 10.2), otherwise WNL.
